EmailTemplate.description: Informs to the Contact ( Customer ) about the Case closure.
EmailTemplate.name: 12. Close Case - Status changed to Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Inquiry Closed: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We have come to a resolution on inquiry {!Case.CaseNumber} and has now been determined as closed.
If you feel you require any additional assistance on this issue, please call us directly at 800-486-8326.
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName}
[{!Case.Thread_Id}]
